title: Helvetica -Poster
content:
I might be wrong in this forum but I'm searching after a poster from a well-kown designer which I can't remember ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221719im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)  
   
The word "Helvetica" was set in Garamond or Times. I'm sure, somebody knows what I'm talking about.   
   
Rhanks, Romesh
author: nike

comments.content: You can see it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221719/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/11541.html#POST20406), thanks to Kent Lew.
Thanks Eduardo, that's the one I was looking for.
